scripts.diff:prod: doppler run -c production --command 'pnpm prisma migrate diff --script --from-url $DATABASE_URL --to-schema-datamodel schema.prisma > diff.sql'
scripts.diff:preview: doppler run -c preview --command 'pnpm prisma migrate diff --script --from-url $DATABASE_URL --to-schema-datamodel schema.prisma > diff.sql'
scripts.dump:prod: doppler run -c production --command 'pnpm supabase db dump --db-url $DATABASE_URL --schema auth -f dump.sql'
scripts.push: doppler run -c dev --command 'prisma db push && pnpm fix-permissions && pnpm gen:kysely && pnpm enable-rls'
scripts.gen: doppler run -- pnpm prisma generate && pnpm gen:kysely && pnpm gen:supabase
scripts.push:prod: doppler run -c production -- prisma db push && prisma generate
scripts.pull: doppler run -c dev -- prisma db pull && prisma generate
scripts.pull:prod: doppler run -c production -- prisma db pull --schemas auth
